# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

## [0.1.0] - 2026-01-20

### Added
- Initial release of MBM CLI platform
- Aaryan programming language support
- AI assistant with local NLP (spaCy)
- Special people profiles (students, faculty)
- Cross-platform media handling
- Wikipedia API integration
- Wikimedia Commons image fetching
- Rich terminal output

### Security
- No cloud LLM dependencies
- Legal-only image sources
- Privacy-respecting design
